title: Interpretation of seeing someone screaming at you in a dream

preview.html: Interpreting this vision requires precise knowledge of the details of the dream and the psychological and social state of the viewer, because there are different vision states, some of which are accompanied by crying with or without sound and others. Interpretation of someone screaming at you in a dreamScreaming in reality expresses sadness, torment, and torment, but in dreams it is a sign of sadness. Happiness and pleasure. Whoever dreams that someone is shouting at him in a dream shows friendship between them. It also indicates understanding and love between them. It may indicate the person’s fear of shame from something water and his desire to warn him. The vision means the presence of good news. The dreamer comes to him through the one he saw calling him in the dream. Dream of screaming and slapping When we dream that we are screaming and being slapped in a dream, this is a sign of good news and comfort. A man who sees himself screaming and slapping himself in his sleep shows that there was a wish that he was desperate to fulfill, but he fulfilled it, which made him feel happy and joyful. As for the one who dreams of screaming and slapping himself The face is a sign of good insight and the dreamer’s ability to evaluate things in his academic, practical, personal, and emotional life. It also indicates the dreamer’s success in choosing the path he takes in life in general. Perhaps this indicates his success and promotion at work. Seeing her screaming in fear and anxiety when we see... Sleeping screaming with someone who feels fear and panic is a sign of calmness that the viewer feels. It may indicate the stability of the viewer’s family. Seeing panic, tension, and fear along with screaming in a dream indicates the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his commitment to duties, the Sunnah, humiliating deeds, and charitable works. Interpretation of seeing a single person screaming in a dream Face. Single person who dreams that he is screaming in the In a dream, he cries loudly, showing his success in study or work as a result of extreme fatigue and effort. To dream of being slapped with screams means marriage to a beautiful and fair girl. A dream of fear accompanied by crying indicates marriage to a woman who was married in the past. Add the dream you would like to interpret, with reference to the marital status, in a comment Below the article, we will respond to it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of seeing reading and hearing Surat At-Takadur in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of reading and listening to Surat At-Takadir in a dream and Surat At-Tafeeq in a dream indicates many desires and immersion in this world and staying away from the world to come, as the vision may indicate staying away from collecting money. If a person sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat At-Takadhar, or hears it, this makes the dreamer want to know the meaning of this dream and its interpretation, but the interpretation varies from one man to a married, pregnant, or divorced man. . Women. God bless this man with good and bad, good morals and a good marriage. A nice girl lives with him a happy life full of stability. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat At-Takad in a dream for a single girl. Reading and listening to Surat At-Takad in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is reading Surat At-Takad, this means that this girl is far from God and does not insist on performing duties. Praying at the specified time.Reading and listening to Surat Al-Takadir in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees Surat Al-Kabir in a dream, this is evidence that the date of this girl’s marriage is approaching and that she will marry a good man with good morals and ethics. And religion and they will live with him in a stable. And a happy life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat At-Takadir in a dream about a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is listening to Surat At-Takatara in a dream, this means that this woman will be announced by God Almighty about her pregnancy and righteous offspring soon and that God will grant her goodness and abundance. Seeing a married woman in a dream Reading Surah At-Takad means that this woman has a good husband and good character and lives with him in a happy and stable life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat At-Takad in a dream about a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat At-Takad, this is evidence that the date of this woman’s birth is approaching and that Her birth will be easy without problems and her fetus will be inside. Good health. A pregnant woman seeing Surat Al-Kabeer in a dream is evidence of the sustenance and goodness that God bestows on her and gets rid of the fears and problems she suffers from during pregnancy after giving birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Atakad in a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is listening to Surah Reproduction, this indicates that this woman suffers from many worries and sorrows in her life, but after this dream these worries disappear and distress comes out from within her. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is reading Surat Al-At-Takadur, this is evidence that God will compensate her for her previous life full of sorrows and that someone else will marry her and you will. She marries him and lives a happy and stable life with him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Takathir in a dream about a man. Reciting and listening to Surat Al-Takathir in a dream. If one sees in a dream that he is reciting Surat Al-Dhikr, this means that this person will be blessed by God with goodness and the poor, and that he is a good person with morals. Praiseworthy and good wedding. A girl with a good personality lives with him a happy life full of stability. Seeing a man in a dream Surat Al-Kabir is evidence that this man will get a promotion in his field of work, and achieve salvation.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a camel chasing me. What is its meaning and significance?

preview.html: Seeing a camel in a dream and interpreting its quest for the dreamer: The camel is considered one of the most important animals that live in the Arab region, and it is used for grazing and moving from one place to another, in contrast to its great importance for meat. As for seeing it in a dream, it has many other things. Interpretations.Interpretation of a dream that a camel is chasing me. Seeing a camel in a dream indicates sadness for some, and it also shows strength, leadership, and the ability to change reality for the better. As for seeing a camel being chased, some scholars have interpreted it as a solution to a disaster or serious problems for you, in the case of the ability to control the camel. And calming him down in the dream and getting your bridle, then you are on your way to guide someone to the path of guidance and righteousness. Interpretation of the dream of hunting a camelBut if you are not able to calm him down and make him follow you and control you, then this vision is interpreted as the closest corruption of the vision. To see that the camel catches Being chased by a camel means That those around you are either a sultan or a prominent figure, or that one of your enemies wants to win you over. The camel is chasing me. Interpretation of dreams for a single girl. An unmarried girl who sees a camel in a dream is evidence that she is close to marrying a righteous man who respects the rights of God. Seeing her chasing a camel in a dream means that the girl An unmarried woman is going through a state of sadness and anguish and hears bad news about the future calf. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about a camel chasing me for a married woman. Watching a married woman chasing a camel indicates that she is going through a state of sadness, grief, and family and financial discomfort. When A married woman sees herself on a camel, the meaning of her vision is the return of her husband who was absent from a long journey, or the return of someone close to her, or the fulfillment of a wish that she thought was difficult. Investigation.Interpretation of a dream about a camel chasing me while I was pregnant. A pregnant woman’s vision of a camel carries good news that she will give birth to a child with a strong and successful personality in her field of study and work. A pregnant woman’s dream of being chased by a raging camel is interpreted as this woman in the eyes of people who hate her for good, so she should not pay attention to them and walk away. About them. Interpretation of a dream about a camel chasing me for a man. A man who sees that he fell from a high camel indicates that he has lost a lot of money in addition to losing his job. Seeing a camel chasing a man indicates that this man will be sad and afraid of what is coming. Interpretation of a man’s dream about chasing a camel in many From people, it is a disorder that affects many people, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Sources:- 1- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, research by Basil Breidi, Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 2- Book of Selected Sayings on the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad ibn Sirin Dar Al-Ma'rifa, Beirut 2000.

title: Chickpeas in a dream and the consequences of eating green or dry chickpeas

preview.html: Watch the interpretation of a dream about chickpeas in a dream through our dreams website. Discover with us the opinions of dream interpreters of seeing chickpeas in a dream in detail. Chickpeas in a dream. Many people wonder about seeing chickpeas in a dream and the interpretation of seeing green chickpeas or dried chickpeas, and what follows. We will refer to interpretations of different cases. From the visions of chickpeas from the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi, so follow us.Interpretation of a dream about chickpeasInterpretation of a dream about chickpeas in a dream, it can be a sign of nourishment, kindness, and blessing.Seeing someone ordering a group of dishes of chickpeas in a dream indicates an abundance of livelihood and abundant money.Vision A person eating from a plate of chickpeas in a dream is a sign of desire, ambition and goals. Interpretation of a dream of hot cooked chickpeas in a dream, a sign of the arrival of happy days. See also: Interpretation of a dream of peanuts in a dream Interpretation of eggplant in a dream Interpretation of a dream of chickpeas in a dream Seeing a woman serving chickpeas in a dream It symbolizes the stability of her married life. Offering a plate of chickpeas in a dream to a married woman to her children is an indication of an increase in their livelihood. A married woman who sees herself eating a plate of chickpeas from her husband is a sign that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. Seeing chickpeas being cooked in a married woman’s dream means Improving her financial condition and financial gains for her husband. To see a pregnant woman feeding her child with chickpeas, and its delicious taste in a dream, means sustenance and nourishment for her fetus. Seeing chickpeas in a pregnant woman’s dream with her husband indicates her health and the health of her fetus. For a pregnant woman to see that her child wants to eat chickpeas in In a dream, this symbolizes her suffering during childbirth and her exposure to trouble. To see a man searching for chickpeas and not dreaming of them means that you will face sorrows and worries. Eating chickpeas in a dream To dream of eating green chickpeas means goodness and blessings in the diet. Dreaming of eating cooked chickpeas is evidence of achieving ambitions. And the fulfillment of desires. To dream of eating chickpeas symbolizes the end of problems and the end of worries. Seeing someone cooking chickpeas and eating them in a dream symbolizes his actions that please his people. Seeing a man greedily eating chickpeas in a dream is evidence of his pursuit of ambitions and hopes. Green chickpeas in a dream. Eating green chickpeas in A dream for a single woman is evidence of achieving the goals she seeks. For an unmarried woman to dream of offering green chickpeas to guests indicates her interest in connecting with her uterus and family. Seeing eating cooked green chickpeas in a married woman’s dream indicates blessings for her husband and children. Interpretation of a dream about cooking green chickpeas for a married woman and giving it to her husband A sign of his love and affection for her. Seeing a pregnant woman feeding her children green chickpeas and it was delicious is a sign that her child will be born to her. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream that she is feeding her children chickpeas, and it tastes bitter in the dream, is evidence of her suffering in life for her and her child. Interpretation of the dream Bitter green chickpeas in dreams can indicate diseases. Seeing green chickpeas turning from bitter to sweet in a dream means recovery from illness and relief from distress. I read about it: Seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the letter D in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the letter Dhal by Ibn Sirin, as the letter Dhal is one of the letters that has many symbols that come in a dream, such as the hand, the wolf, the fly, and gold. You may be interested in meeting bees in a dream. There are many interpretations that differ according to the symbol that comes in the dream and according to the dreamer, and it is important to confirm However, it is not a requirement that the vision or dream express real things that can affect a person’s life, because in many cases the dream or vision is thoughts that circulate in the dreamer’s mind and appear in the dream. The meaning of the word “We remember God” in a dream is that seeing the word “remembrance of God” is equivalent to reciting the Qur’an. Or supplication in a dream indicates that the person having the vision is a wise man, and God knows best. The person who sees himself mentioning God in a dream. If one sees himself mentioning God in a dream, this means that the enemies are moving away from him and getting rid of them. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter “Dhalal” by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing the letter “Dhalal” by Ibn Sirin is considered Sirin is one of the best interpretations that many people trust, as he believes that seeing the letter Dhal in a dream expresses a psychological crisis that the dreamer is going through during this period. God knows best. There are many symbols that have been seen that are symbols of the letter Z, such as slaughter in a dream, which expresses Disobedience and injustice. Just as we see a person in a dream slaughtering a person, this indicates that the dreamer is an unjust person, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams with the word “Remembrance of God” Seeing the word “remembrance of God” in dreams, or reading the Qur’an, or supplication, or worship, then this vision is referred to the dreamer by The wise. God knows best. Just as a person sees himself mentioning God many times, this indicates getting rid of enemies, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the word chin. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter “dhaal” by Ibn Sirin when it comes to the index of the chin, which is the part located below the palate, which when seen In a dream, it expresses that the master of the tribe or the tribal union owns it. God knows best. Interpretation of seeing flies in a dream. One of the most important interpretations of seeing flies in a dream is that the dreamer is a bad man or that he will obtain prohibited money. God knows best. Just like flies in a dream when the dreamer sees them flying in the sky, This indicates that there is an enemy lurking in the dreamer, but it is not a strong enemy. In addition to seeing flies in a dream falling on the dreamer, in this case it is important to be careful about money because it is threatened with theft. God knows best. But when a person sees that he is killing flies in a dream, this is comfort. And health for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a wolf in a dream. Interpretation of the appearance of the letter D by Ibn Sirin. When the sign is a wolf, such as the dreamer seeing a wolf hunting, this is one of the signs that promises joy and goodness to the dreamer. Just like seeing a wolf in a dream making a pet, this indicates the presence of His goodness. I know. But in general, a wolf in a dream is the closest interpretation of a deceiver, a liar. The meaning of this in a dream: Seeing humiliation in a dream is interpreted by many interpreters as a lack of religion, poverty, or lack of nutrition, and God knows best. Since the person who sees himself in a dream Being humiliated, this is evidence of the victory and honor of the dreamer. R

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a manager in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a manager in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and seeing a manager in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, overcoming difficulties, and good luck to you. Dreaming in a happy state, this means the dreamer’s happiness and success in what he does; And vice versa, when the director is angry and unhappy, this is true, which means that the dreamers suffer loss and lack of success in life. Interpretation of dreams of seeing the director in a dream, signs of the director working in a dream, single and pregnant women, the meaning of the director’s cry, the director’s death scene, description The trip with the director, the director in charge of the organization, whether it is a company, school or bank, we usually see him at work or meet while studying, there are many people who dream of arguing with the director or traveling with the director in their dreams and they cannot find the appropriate interpretation for that today we will meet the director He explains his vision in a dream in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a director in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a director in a dream symbolizes wisdom, prudence, diligence, empathy, and logic. Dreaming about a smiling director is a sign of a happy life, psychological comfort, and inner peace. As for seeing a director in a dream, it represents a feeling of loneliness and not interacting with people and interacting with them. Dreaming of directors controlling their dreams is evidence of parental control, whether the father or mother is in the observer’s life. The interpretation that the dreamer cooperated with the director in the dream is evidence of the success of the dreamer’s achievement. Seeing a former director in a dream is evidence related to the past. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the director in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the director for single people. Dream spoke to the director in a dignified and polite manner during a woman’s testimony, indicating that she heard a lot of good news in the following period and felt happy. Interpretation of the dream of marrying the director in a single woman’s dream, indicating that you will get a job Prestigious or you will be promoted to a higher position. A dream about a director receiving a generous reward in a woman’s dream proves that she can get what she wants after hard work and long-term patience. Dreaming about seeing female directors shaking hands with single women in their dreams is evidence of their engagement and marriage to wealthy people of a higher social status. The director's love for a single woman's dream vision shows a stable emotional relationship, which can end in an imminent marriage. Interpretation of the director's dream for a married woman. Explanation of the director's vision and commentary on the dreams of a married woman, proving the increase of halal money, the breadth of people's lives, and the repetition of blessings. The dream of a married woman, the director, indicates that Dreaming about directors dreams, indicates that she will spend happy days with her family and family in the future. In the dream, he gave gifts to a woman who is married to the director, which indicates that he will receive a lot of money through inheritance. The married woman’s point of view proved that her husband was working as a director in her dream And the stability of her family and the improvement of her relationship with her husband after a period of disagreement. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a failed exam in a dream. Interpretation of the indicative vision for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about a happy director, in which a happy woman dreams

title: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn SirinIt indicates a cunning enemy who wants to harm the dreamer or indicates a jealous person who hates what he has achieved. The vision in an unmarried woman's dream indicates a person who is trying to exploit and harm her. Getting rid of them in a dream is a snake, which indicates the death of sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of seeing a black snake in the house. Seeing a black snake in your house in a dream indicates betrayal of those close to you, and betrayal can come to you from your neighbor, friend, or even your brother. You see many snakes. The black color in a dream is interpreted as Sudden betrayal by people who hate you and show you the opposite of what they hide. If the dreamer is a money trader and owner. In a dream, a black snake in his house interprets this dream as epileptic seizures that may affect him in his work. Or it indicates a major financial loss. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a divorced womanIf she sees Mrs. Divorced: For a black snake in his dream, this is interpreted as being surrounded by many people waiting to harm him. It is also interpreted as tension, sadness, and crises surrounding him from all sides. This dream also indicates that the divorced woman has committed many acts and has moved away from our Lord. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a single woman: If you dream of a free girl, in her dream, the black snake indicates her negative thoughts and depression. This dream is a harbinger for her from the people closest to her, because whoever set a trap for her. This dream warns her to be careful, otherwise she will trust anyone until she feels comfortable With him, especially when it comes to marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a man: When you see a man in a dream, a black snake paint stands on the door of his house and this dream shows that he and his family feel jealous and spiteful. If a black snake, inside the house and in the bathroom, it is interpreted as someone cursing and insulting them. If he is in the kitchen, This dream is interpreted as a lack of food and general nutrition. If a black snake was standing on the roof of the house, then this dream indicates neglect and sadness that will befall the dreamer. They often explain seeing a black snake in a dream. There is enmity between the family and relatives, and the dreamer must be careful. Caution and takes this into account.Interpretation of a dream about a black snake for a married woman by Ibn Sirin. When a married woman sees a black snake in her dream, this is interpreted as another woman cursing her and sleeping on her with people. He also wants to seduce her by any means because he hates her and hates her. If he wakes up, a black snake explains the bulldog. A married man in a dream is one of the many problems that the dreamer will face. Even if you kill a black snake, it shows that his enemy is very weak and easy to defeat. If a married woman is pregnant, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a dream about a black snake and killing it. When you see in a dream what you are doing, hitting the snake. Its black color explains the disappearance of problems. In your life. If a snake strikes, it indicates your victory over an enemy and the elimination of your problems. If a young man dreams that he killed a black snake, this is interpreted as the disappearance of his big problems from his life. It may be interpreted as

If you see yourself pulling someone’s hair in a dream, this may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time. It is possible that the dream of grabbing a man’s hair indicates happiness and a broad diet that the dreamer will gain. In the coming days. A dream about grabbing a man’s hair in a dream may indicate the abundant nutrition that the dreamer will gain during this period. It is possible to see a man pulling another man’s hair in a dream, which indicates that he is trying to achieve many successes in his life at that time, and God knows best. If you see yourself holding the hand of a dead person with great force, this may indicate the person’s position in the heart of the dead person, and God knows best. A dead person in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is connected to the dead person and thinks about him a lot at the present time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing a store in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a store through the vision website roy2a.com, the word “store” refers to all the places that contain goods and to which the consumer goes when he wants to buy any type of goods, and there are many different numbers for these stores all over the world, and seeing a store in a dream is Common things that people ask about the meaning behind them, and today we will present the most important interpretations of major dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen. So follow us. Interpretation of seeing a store in a dream. Seeing a food store and buying products in a dream. The importance of fulfilling desires and dreams in reality. My opinions. Seeing a children’s toy store in a dream means the dreamer’s intense desire to return to childhood days and memories. Checking out a pet and ornamental fish store. An indication of the existence of new relationships. In the life of the dreamer, such as friendships and acquaintances. Seeing a store with predatory animals in a dream indicates the presence of haters and evil people around the dreamer and in his life. Entering the store and the viewer is unable to buy due to lack of money. Indicates the obstacles and problems that the viewer faces in his life. Seeing a clothing store in a dream and buying new clothes is one of the visions The good deed that heralds the coming food and goodness for the pioneer. Seeing a gold store in a dream indicates an unmarried woman’s approaching marriage to a married woman near the period of pregnancy. Seeing a store with high prices in a dream indicates crises and difficulties that the viewer will face. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a store or shop in Dream Interpretation of seeing the store in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that I saw the store in a dream. It is an indication of livelihood and money that will come to the monarch. Checking the old store and there are no goods. It is a sign that the viewer is exposed to financial difficulties. Seeing a very narrow store in a dream is an indication of problems and crises in the life of the dreamer. Seeing a store in it. Cheap productsIn the good news, God will hear it. A closed store in a dream is a sign of dreams and wishes that the dreamer may have but cannot achieve. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing prices rise in the supermarket in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a store in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a girl buying things from a store is an indication of the fulfillment of her dreams. And the aspirations that she seeks. Seeing a gold store for single women in a dream is a sign of her approaching engagement or marriage. Seeing a new clothing store in a dream for a girl is a sign of happy news and livelihood in her life, and when she buys it, it will improve. Seeing a closed or cramped store for a girl is a sign that she will be exposed to crises and problems in her life. Interpretation Seeing a store in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a store of toys and wedding dresses for a married woman indicates her imminent pregnancy. Seeing a gold store in a dream indicates for a married woman that a change will occur in her life for the better. Seeing a clothing store shows a married woman the next good and food in her life and in her home. I see myself going To go to a grocery store and buy from it for a married woman is evidence of her ability to take responsibility at home

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Sawad in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Sawad in a dream and its meaning is that the name Sawad is one of the names that distinguishes its bearer from others, as it shows happiness, joy, fulfillment of desires, and access to everything that a person has in a dream, and during this article we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Sawad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Seeing the name Sawad in a dream and its meaning. If one sees the name Sawad in a dream, it contains these wonderful interpretations, meanings and connotations, and during this paragraph we will get to know you and the interpretation of the dream of seeing the name Sawad in a dream and its meaning. It is also: If an unmarried girl dreams of a woman coming to her house, For her name is Sawad. This dream is evidence that happiness and joy will knock on this girl’s door. Moreover, if this girl is distressed and distressed, the Almighty God will comfort her. On the other hand, if the girl sees that she is called Sawad in the dream, and she changes her name. It will be This is evidence that she will be happy in her life. Also, this girl will hear a lot of good news soon, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the girl sees that there is a man coming and he calls her Sawad in the dream. This indicates engagement or marriage soon by God’s command. See also: Interpretation Dreaming of driving a car with dead people in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreaming of the name Saad in a dream, especially since these names contain good and good connotations and meanings. This has been interpreted by many scholars and experts in dream interpretation, and during this paragraph we will explain to you the interpretation of dreaming of the name Saad in a dream is also: And according to what he mentioned. Many scholars of interpretation say that the name Saad is one of the names that brings happiness and pleasure to the fortune teller. This vision also shows that God Almighty will care for the fortune teller and protect him a lot. Then the life of the dreamer will be a life full of happiness and contentment, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Because God Almighty will determine the life of the dreamer in The best condition. See also: Interpretation of a dream about digging a grave in a dream according to scholars. Complete interpretation of the name Sawad in a pregnant woman’s dream.. She dreams of seeing the name Sawad, especially since this name carries many meanings and connotations that are considered good and good for the fortuneteller, but they differ depending on the condition of the fortuneteller, and here we will look at an explanation for you. The name Sawad in a pregnant woman’s dream is also: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is giving birth, and she is a woman, then she is called Sawad. This vision is evidence that he brings goodness and happiness in life. Then it indicates that God Almighty will take care of this woman from where she does not expect it. And God is Most High and All-Knowing. Meanwhile, if a pregnant woman sees in a dream that her husband has married a woman named Swad, this vision indicates that her husband will benefit from trade or increase in goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees that she is sitting among women and next to them. A woman named Sawad. This vision is evidence that this woman will achieve happiness. Because this happiness has no limits, and God Almighty knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing money taken from an unknown person in a dream.
